Click here to return to Vence Magazine Introduction Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Beauty QUICKGUIDE

Master Craftsman Franck Spinelli and his team welcome you to his salon. We take great pride in giving you the best advice for the health and beauty of your hair. We use Goldwell products. We look forward to your visit. 9 ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 09 54 08h00-12h30/14h300-18h30. Saturday and Sunday closed. Capillus II Coiffure Adresse 9 Avenue de la Résistance 06140 Vence, France

9h00-19h30. Sunday closed. Carole Beauté 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 7:14 AM Come and escape in an atmosphere of 1001 pleasures, with face and body-card products (without harmful preservatives or GMOs) including Mary-Cohr essential oils. Soft waxing, false nails, UV tanning. 18, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 21 27

Our dynamic professional team are all Redken trained. Find us on Facebook! 17 ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 30 00 E-Mail: frank.zell@free.fr 9h00-18h00. Student special offer: 20% discount every day, plus a full make-over adapted to your style and personality. 25 ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 57 47

La Maison de Beauté Enter into our world of beauty and well-being. For your great pleasure, discover our beauticians’ professionalism. We use Carita, Decleor and LPG brands. 40bis ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 03 84 E-Mail: contact@lamaisondebeautevence.fr 9h00-19h00. Sunday closed. 44-46 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/1 Adresse 46 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

09h00-18h00. Sunday closed. Jean-Louis David Adresse 16 Place du Grand Jardin 06140 Vence, France Our team is here to take care of you while you relax in our friendly atmosphere. Test it - no appointment necessary. We use Urban Care brand. Discover the colours of the future with INOA. 1 ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 20 94 E-Mail: jld.vence@orange.fr

Get the best vision with Varilux lenses, thanks to our partnership with French company Essilor. Experience natural vision. 25, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 29 13 E-Mail: m.maquestiaux@free.fr 08h30-12h30/14h00-19h00. Saturday, and Sunday closed. Adresse 25 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France Atol

9h00-19h00/Wednesday and Saturday 09h00-12h00. Sunday closed. Rue Stamford - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 84 42

Treat yourself to a moment of relaxation and well-being in the warm ambiance of our salon. We are at your service. 164 ave Emile Hugues - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 01 55 09h00-19h00/Saturday 18h00. Sunday closed. Sandrine Coiffure Adresse 134 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France

10h00-12h00/15h00-10h00. Saturday and Sunday closed. As a member of the “Opticiens Libres” network, Marc Soler is committed to the well-being, quality and improvement of your eyesight. 60 ave Victor Tuby - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 20 60 E-Mail: marclopticien@gmail.com Marc l’Opticien 39 Avenue Victor Tuby, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 39 Avenue Victor Tuby 06140 Vence, France 9/21/13 3:21

Our team will be glad to show you the best brands of glasses. We offer special discounts - such as the second pair at only €1 - even for progressive sunglasses. 39 ave Victor Tuby - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 50 00 E-Mail: c01947@audioptic.net 9h00-12h30/14h30-19h00. Sunday closed. Optic 2000 39 Avenue Victor Tuby, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/21/13 3:21 PM Adresse 39 Avenue Victor Tuby 06140 Vence, France

9h00-12h30/14h30-19h00. Sunday closed Chabert Opticiens Krys Adresse 9 Avenue de la Résistance 06140 Vence, France For over 40 years Chabert Opticiens Krys has put its experience at your service. Our fully qualified team will carefully prepare your optical equipment: glasses, contact lenses, sunglasses... 6 ave de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 24 03 E-Mail: vence-laresistance@krys.com

For the past 30 years Guinot institute has provided facial care, waxing, manicure and pedicure in a cosy and relaxing environment. We also sell “Guinot and Payot” range of products. 83, ave Victor Tuby - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 12 86 09h30-19h30. Wednesday and Sunday closed. Beline Institut de Beaute 83 Avenue Victor Tuby, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 9/17/13 6:51 AM Adresse 83 Avenue Victor Tuby 06140 Vence, France

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
